CustomField.description: Check this to merge oppty line items having the same entitlement number. Use start and end date ranges to combine first start date with last end date. Do NOT aggregate (SUM) user counts. Important that user count also must be the same.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this to merge oppty line items having the same entitlement number. Use start and end date ranges to combine first start date with last end date. Do NOT aggregate (SUM) user counts. Important that user count also must be the same.
CustomField.label: Merge Date Ranges
